projects.title: TypeScript Floor Plan Generator
projects.description: Systematic approach to floor plan optimization, formulating space utilization problems and developing data-driven solutions. Analyzes layout constraints and develops optimization algorithms to maximize space efficiency and workflow productivity.

projects.title: SC2002 Internship Placement System
projects.description: Data-driven system for internship placement optimization. Formulates matching problems based on student skills and company requirements, using systematic analysis to improve placement efficiency and satisfaction rates.

projects.title: Image Segmentation - Pytorch Attention U-Net
projects.description: Systematic approach to image analysis and segmentation. Formulates computer vision problems for automated quality inspection and process monitoring, developing data-driven solutions for manufacturing applications.

projects.title: AIChE NTU Student Chapter Official Website
projects.description: Modern, responsive website for the American Institute of Chemical Engineers NTU Student Chapter showcasing events, member resources, and chapter activities. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for optimal performance and accessibility.

projects.title: SC1003 Battleship Game (Pygame)
projects.description: Interactive Battleship game built with Pygame featuring AI opponent, graphical interface, and strategic gameplay mechanics.

projects.title: Pandemic Simulation Game
projects.description: Epidemiological modeling and simulation system. Formulates disease spread dynamics problems using statistical analysis and simulation frameworks to understand and predict pandemic behavior.

projects.title: Covid-19 Data Analytics
projects.description: Comprehensive data analysis project examining COVID-19 trends and patterns. Formulates time-series forecasting problems using statistical modeling and data visualization to extract meaningful insights from pandemic data.

projects.title: TF2 Deep FloorPlan Recognition
projects.description: Deep learning system for architectural pattern recognition. Formulates computer vision problems using neural networks for automated floor plan analysis and facility management applications.

projects.title: OneArena 2024 Robotics Competition
projects.description: Robotic navigation system development for maze solving. Formulates pathfinding optimization problems using systematic algorithms and real-time decision making for autonomous robot control.

projects.title: URECA: Optimization of 3D SU-8 Microstructures using Mask-less Lithography
projects.description: Process optimization research in semiconductor manufacturing. Formulates lithography parameter optimization problems using systematic data analysis to improve yield and reduce defects in wafer fabrication processes.
